瑹瑹瑹

瑹字的基本解释

瑹
tú
美玉。

瑹
shū
笏，古代君臣在朝廷上相见时所执的狭长板子，用玉等制成，于上面记事。

瑹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shū］
［《廣韻》傷魚切，平魚，書。］
笏。玉制的手板。

瑹字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑹； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页740第12
【廣韻】傷魚切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】商居切，?音書。【玉篇】廣雅云：瑹班，?笏也。或作荼。【禮·玉藻】諸侯荼，前絀後直。【註】絀謂圓殺其首，不爲椎頭。諸侯惟天子詘焉，所詘在前也。　又【玉篇】美玉。　又【集韻】通都切，音㻌。義同。

瑹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瑹字的起名意思

指美玉或是古代君臣在朝廷上相见时所执的狭长板子，用玉等制成。

Xuan
Basic explanation of words
Xuan
tú
Beautiful jade.
Xuan
shū
Wat, a long and narrow board held by ancient kings and ministers when they met at the court, made of jade, etc., and recorded on it.
Xuan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shū］
["Guangyun" cut fish, flat fish, book. ]
Wat. Jade prototype.
Xuan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瑹; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 740 No. 12
[Guang Yun] cut fish cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] business and residence cut, sound book. [Jade articles] Guang Yayun: Suban,? Wu Ye. Or make tea. [Li·Yuzao] The princes are full of flowers, the front is stubborn and the back is straight. [Note] Ruan said that the round kills its head, not the vertebral head. The princes, but the emperor's censorship, are the first to censure.　[Jade articles] Beautiful jade.　 [Ji Yun] All cut, sound 㻌. The same meaning.
Xuan

Xuan
Name meaning
Refers to beautiful jade or the long and narrow board held by ancient kings and ministers when they met at the court, made of jade.
shū, tū
